properties.sfomuseum:creditline: Gift of the William Hough Collection
properties.sfomuseum:description: Timetable issued by British Commonwealth Pacific Airlines (BCPA) promoting transpacific Douglas DC-6 sleeper service, effective September 1, 1951; two-page double-sided fold-out; blue, red, and white cover with text promoting service to Canada, USA, Hawaii, Fiji, Australia, and New Zealand.
properties.wof:name: timetable: British Commonwealth Pacific Airlines (BCPA), transpacific Douglas DC-6 Sleeper Service
